alert.note: Alert for Carter; Garvin; Love; McClain; Murray; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 9:42AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Garvin, northwestern Love, Carter, Murray, southern Pottawatomie and southeastern McClain Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 942 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles north of Antioch to near Katie to 3 miles south of Graham to near Rubottom. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Pauls Valley, Sulphur, Davis, Lone Grove, Healdton, Wynnewood, Wilson, Stratford, Maysville, Dickson, Springer, Elmore City, Paoli, Wanette, Katie, Byars, Dougherty, Gene Autry and Tatums. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 22 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Carter; Garvin; Love; McClain; Murray; Pottawatomie
